languages.text: {n}Между стражами Малгара и шаттлами зажата группа окровавленных и напуганных людей, в которых вы признаете губернатора планеты и его высокопоставленную свиту. Их дорогие одежды изорваны в борьбе, на телах многих зияют раны, оставленные штыками.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Между стражами Малгара и шаттлами зажата группа окровавленных и напуганных людей, в которых вы признаете губернатора планеты и его высокопоставленную свиту. Их дорогие одежды изорваны в борьбе, на телах многих зияют раны, оставленные штыками.{/n}

languages.text: {n}A group of bloodied and frightened people is wedged between Malgar's wardens and the shuttles. You recognise them as the governor of the planet and the members of his high-ranking entourage. Their expensive attire has been torn in the fight and many bear wounds left by bayonets.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Между стражами Малгара и шаттлами зажата группа окровавленных и напуганных людей, в которых вы признаете губернатора планеты и его высокопоставленную свиту. Их дорогие одежды изорваны в борьбе, на телах многих зияют раны, оставленные штыками.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A group of bloodied and frightened people stands between Malgar's soldiers and the shuttles — the governor and members of his esteemed entourage. Their expensive attire has been torn in the fighting, many bear wounds left by bayonets.{/n}

{n}A group of bloodied and frightened people stands between Malgar's soldiers and the shuttles — the governor and members of his esteemed entourage. Their expensive attire has been torn in the fighting, many bear wounds left by bayonets.{/n}

{n}A group of bloodied and frightened people is wedged between Malgar's wardens and the shuttles. You recognise them to be the governor of the planet and the members of his esteemed entourage. Their expensive attire has been torn in the fight, many bear wounds left by bayonets.{/n}

{n}A group of bloodied and frightened people is wedged between Malgar's wardens and the shuttles. You recognise them to be the governor of the planet and the members of his esteemed entourage. Their expensive attire has been torn in the fight, many bear wounds left by bayonets.{/n}

{n}A group of bloodied and frightened people is wedged between Malgar's wardens and the shuttles. You recognise them as the governor of the planet and the members of his high-ranking entourage. Their expensive attire has been torn in the fight and many bear wounds left by bayonets.{/n}

{n}A group of bloodied and frightened people is wedged between Malgar's wardens and the shuttles. You recognise them as the governor of the planet and the members of his high-ranking entourage. Their expensive attire has been torn in the fight and many bear wounds left by bayonets.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine Gruppe blutiger und verängstigter Leute sitzt zwischen Malgars Soldaten und den Shuttles fest. Du erkennst den Gouverneur des Planeten und die Mitglieder seines Gefolges. Ihre teure Kleidung wurde im Kampf zerrissen, viele wurden von Bajonetten verwundet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A group of bloodied and frightened people is wedged between Malgar's wardens and the shuttles. You recognise them as the governor of the planet and the members of his high-ranking entourage. Their expensive attire has been torn in the fight and many bear wounds left by bayonets.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine Gruppe blutiger und verängstigter Leute sitzt zwischen Malgars Soldaten und den Shuttles fest. Du erkennst den Gouverneur des Planeten und die Mitglieder seines Gefolges. Ihre teure Kleidung wurde im Kampf zerrissen, viele wurden von Bajonetten verwundet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un groupe de personnes en sang et manifestement terrifiées s'entasse entre les soldats de Malgar et les navettes. Vous reconnaissez parmi elles le gouverneur de la planète et les membres haut placés de son entourage. Leurs oripeaux luxueux ont été déchirés pendant la bataille et nombre d'entre eux ont souffert de la morsure des baïonnettes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A group of bloodied and frightened people is wedged between Malgar's wardens and the shuttles. You recognise them as the governor of the planet and the members of his high-ranking entourage. Their expensive attire has been torn in the fight and many bear wounds left by bayonets.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un groupe de personnes en sang et manifestement terrifiées s'entasse entre les soldats de Malgar et les navettes. Vous reconnaissez parmi elles le gouverneur de la planète et les membres de son entourage. Leurs oripeaux luxueux ont été déchirés pendant la bataille et nombre d'entre eux ont souffert de la morsure des baïonnettes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一群浑身是血、惊恐不已的人们挤在马尔加的卫兵与穿梭机之间。你认出来，这些人正是行星总督与他尊贵的随行人员。他们昂贵的服饰在打斗中被扯破，许多人也被刺刀刺伤。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A group of bloodied and frightened people is wedged between Malgar's wardens and the shuttles. You recognise them as the governor of the planet and the members of his high-ranking entourage. Their expensive attire has been torn in the fight and many bear wounds left by bayonets.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一群浑身是血、惊恐不已的人们挤在马尔加的卫兵与穿梭机之间。你认出来，这些人正是行星总督与他尊贵的随行人员。他们昂贵的服饰在打斗中被扯破，许多人也被刺刀刺伤。{/n}

languages.text: {n}おびえた血まみれの人々がマルガーの監視員とシャトルに挟まれている。彼らはこの惑星の総督と、彼の信頼ある高官の側近たちだとわかる。彼らの高価な衣服は戦いで破れ、銃剣による傷を負っている者も多い。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A group of bloodied and frightened people is wedged between Malgar's wardens and the shuttles. You recognise them as the governor of the planet and the members of his high-ranking entourage. Their expensive attire has been torn in the fight and many bear wounds left by bayonets.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}おびえた血まみれの人々がマルガーの監視員とシャトルに挟まれている。彼らはこの惑星の総督と、彼の信頼ある側近たちだとわかる。彼らの高価な衣服は戦いで破れ、銃剣による傷を負っている者も多い。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un grupo de gente ensangrentada y asustada se interpone entre los guardias de Malgar y las lanzaderas. Reconoces al gobernador del planeta y a los miembros de su noble séquito. Sus caros atuendos se han rasgado en el combate, muchos llevan heridas de bayoneta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A group of bloodied and frightened people is wedged between Malgar's wardens and the shuttles. You recognise them as the governor of the planet and the members of his high-ranking entourage. Their expensive attire has been torn in the fight and many bear wounds left by bayonets.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un grupo de gente ensangrentada y asustada se interpone entre los guardias de Malgar y las lanzaderas. Reconoces al gobernador del planeta y a los miembros de su séquito. Sus caros atuendos se han rasgado en el combate, muchos llevan heridas de bayoneta.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Malgar'ın dizdarları ile mekiklerin arasında kalmış bir grup yaralı ve korkmuş insan görüyorsun. Fark ediyorsun ki bu topluluk, gezegenin valisi ve yüksek rütbeli maiyetinin mensuplarından oluşuyor. Pahalı kıyafetleri arbedede yırtılmış, pek çoğunda da süngü yarası bulunuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A group of bloodied and frightened people is wedged between Malgar's wardens and the shuttles. You recognise them as the governor of the planet and the members of his high-ranking entourage. Their expensive attire has been torn in the fight and many bear wounds left by bayonets.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Malgar'ın muhafızları ile mekiklerin arasında kalmış bir grup yaralı ve korkmuş insan görüyorsun. Fark ediyorsun ki bu grup, gezegenin valisi ve yüksek rütbeli maiyetinin mensuplarından oluşuyor. Pahalı kıyafetleri kavgada yırtılmış, pek çoğunda da süngü yarası bulunuyor.{/n}
